content:
Hi All,
I am trying to access the link of HSPC Sandbox "https://api-v8-r4.hspconsortium.org/DaVinciCDexPayer/open" but it is not getting opened .Is there any problem with this link or whether it has been changed??
Thanks in advance.
The HSPC sandboxes are being migrated to a new domain logicahealth.org. Please try this link https://api.logicahealth.org/DaVinciCDexPayer/open
Hi @Viet Nguyen ,I tried ths link "https://api.logicahealth.org/DaVinciCDexPayer/open"it not working.
@rekha - Please give the endpoint another try. I was able to use the ClinFHIR.com client tool and connect to the server.
@Viet Nguyen I was able to use the ClinFHIR.com client tool and connect to the server. What does it mean?? and I tried the link it is not working

follow these steps (if you haven't followed them already :)

  1. load clinfhir.com
  2. at the top right (under current servers) click 'Add server', then paste 'https://api.logicahealth.org/DaVinciCDexPayer/open/ into the url box (be sure to keep the trailing /)
  3. click the 'Test' button that appears to the lower right in the dialog. All going well you should get a message saying that the server can be added. Add a name for the server, select the FHIR version as R4 and save. You'll return to the main screen.
  4. Now, click the 'edit' link in the top right. You should be able to select the server you just added as the data server. Do so, and save.

Now you can load the Patient View app, and you will be accessing the server that Viet has mentioned, and you just added. I was able to add a new patient and view their resources.

Let me know if you still have issues.

@Viet Nguyen Should I set this new server up in the main list? If so, does it replace an existing one?

Thank you David. No need to add the endpoint. Itâ€™s a Da Vinci specific endpoint. V
